main.name: Venktesh Viswanathan
main.occupation: The 22nd Dutch-Belgian Information Retrieval Workshop (Offline), November 27, 2023
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: DIR 2023 is inviting Belgium and Netherlands-based researchers to present their work. We invite contributions of previously published articles to be delivered as a 15-minutes lightning talks. Please, fill in the form if you would like to present your work at DIR this year or would like to nominate someone. You can expect vibrant discussions and plenty of social interactions. Don't hesitate and claim your spot.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.
